scripts.k8s:agw: cd agw && kubectl apply -f k8s && cd ..
scripts.build:agw: ./gradlew clean build && cd agw && docker build -f Dockerfile -t msagw-agw build/libs && kubectl apply -f k8s && cd ..
scripts.k8s:portal: cd portal && kubectl apply -f k8s && cd ..
scripts.build:portal: cd portal && docker build -t msagw-portal . && kubectl apply -f k8s && cd ..
scripts.k8s:users: cd users && kubectl apply -f k8s && cd ..
scripts.build:users: ./gradlew clean build && cd users && docker build -f Dockerfile -t msagw-users build/libs && kubectl apply -f k8s && cd ..
